Hello, Hello,

EDIS is proud to present 2 new locations:


* Bucharest, Romania (not Voxility) - http://ro.edis.at 31.215.205.1 2a03:f80:40::1
* Moscow, Russia - http://ru.edis.at 213.183.56.1 2a02:150:7::1

All VRS and KVM Services are available there, and our LEB offer:
http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/edis-e5-512mb-kvm-vps-in-12-countries-atchdeuksefrplitisesnl-us/

Is applicable as well to both locations.

So why still wait? [Why not grab a 5EUR (/mo ex. VAT) 512MB KVM in Russia as VPN](https://manage.edis.at/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=10&configoption[12]=177&promocode=LEB2013)? [or a 17.40EUR  (/yr ex. VAT) VRS Micro](https://manage.edis.at/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&configoption[11]=179)? :)
